pr_title: Fix entity properties not being sent to vanilla clients at all

timeline.message: Fix VanillaConnectionNetworkFilter sending out invalid entity properties packets without an entity ID

timeline.bodyText: Won't using Collections.emptyList throw an UnsupportedOperationException when adding the snapshots further down the line? Shouldn't we use a new ArrayList?
timeline.author: ichttt

replies.bodyText: SEntityPropertiesPacket always initializes its snapshot field as Lists.newArrayList. This constructor parameter is only used in a for loop to fill that snapshots list. However as we already have a list of snapshots here (and not a list of ModifiableAttributeInstance, I pass in an empty list so the constructor does not add anything to the snapshots list - we will do that later manually.
replies.author: diesieben07

replies.bodyText: You are right, for some reason I misread the code there.
replies.author: ichttt
